Class ProjectUIUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ProjectUIUpdate

  • public class ProjectUIUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    The settings of the view of the main window depending on project actions and type of project

      • setBuildLabel

        public void setBuildLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Sets the label for the menu item for creating a build
        Parameters:
        label - the label that describes the build

      • enableProjActions

        public void enableProjActions(boolean isCompile,
                              boolean isRun,
                              boolean isBuild,
                              int projCount)
        Enables/disables menu items and toolbar buttons for project actions
        Parameters:
        isCompile - true to enable the compilation action
        isRun - true to enable the run action
        isBuild - true to enable the build action
        projCount - the number of loaded projects. If 1 the action to show the fileview is enabled, if 2 the action to change between projects is enabled

      • enableChangeProj

        public void enableChangeProj()
        Enables the menu item and toolbar button for changing project

      • updateFileTree

        public void updateFileTree()
        Updates the file tree. Used if the file structure may have changed.

        Parameters:

        Displays the project name in the status bar
